comment.body: @SomeName666: yes, your soul will be provided with a new physical vessel.

@caryoscelus: Yeah, its a reference to reincarnation, makes perfectly sense if you think about how the universe and our world works.
Stars die and new stars are born, living beings die and new living beings are born, its all chained.
@leftside: Are you religious? i believe in simple logic, not made-up facts like religion, other animals are not inferior beings. (but everyone can believe in their own theories)
@leftside: And thats were our Intelligence clashes with our nature. (the result of evolution & eating cooked meat)
@leftside: Not everything, but majority of things do, learning, seeing certain stuff, long time exposure to certain stuff.
@leftside: They are in a less developed state, their brains are not as developed as humans, doesnt make them lower life forms.
@System Anomaly: Everything as in "most of stuff around" i should probably change the text for most stuff if the message doesnt come across.

@leftside: Yes they do, in my country its illegal to butch animals yourself, theres are laws against butching yourself because they say its cruel.. wich is contradicting because you can just buy meat everywhere.

@leftside: i dont know mencius.

News from state controlled tv channels is always manipulated to the likes of the state.

The Movie & Music industry are also all conspiring together.

Looks at all the movie and music productions wich are available, they are mostly about either money, bitches, sex brand clothing (sponsors).

Theres also violent-cartoons and science-fiction movies wich can be dangerous for children, especially young ones (they dont understant the concept of reality and fantasy yet).

Don't get me wrong, just as children can, adult's can also be influenced (manipulated, brainwashed) by certain music, news & movies.
@leftside: So what? your so called "God" also won't.

@SomeName666: Its funny, i wrote someone that everyone gets brainwashed, even me, so no doubt about it, i do like some music, but after all, im also just a result of this "Human" world.
I like relaxing music like Amazon rainforest sounds and crickets at night, but if you talk about actual singing music i like some non-english slower & chill 70's music.
@leftside: I think you are already aware, but i dont believe in that.
@Kid Courageous: Sacrificed for the cycle, not to be wasted (like some ancient cultures did).
I like theories about origin of all life.
@Kid Courageous: I know that, i dont believe in wasted sacrifices.
